custom_css: .footers_menu ul {display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center;}

settings.backcontent: Drs. Giulia Gandolfo and Adrian Sznajder, founders of H-BOSS.com, are thyroid and hormonal health experts who, after overcoming their own health (thyroid and PCOS) struggles, embraced natural and Ayurvedic medicine. Based in Italy and the US, they have helped over 1000 women lose weight, balance hormones, and alleviate symptoms like fatigue, hair loss, and anxiety through their online community, doctor-formulated supplements, and innovative programs, empowering women to live healthier and happier lives.
settings.statements: *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
